msg: LANG-621: ReflectionToStringBuilder.toString does not debug 3rd party object fields within 3rd party object. Suggested by Philip Hodges. Final patch from Thomas Neidhart.

msg: HTTPASYNC-69: premature cancellation of response consumer to immediately shut down and release the underlying connection

msg: HTTPASYNC-69: async request handler is closed by HttpAsyncRequestExecutor#closed if the underlying connection is found to be in an inconsistent state
